alert.note: Alert for Calcasieu; East Cameron; Jefferson Davis; West Cameron (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 10:01AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Cameron, south central Jefferson Davis and southeastern Calcasieu Parishes through 1030 AM CDT... At 1001 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Holmwood, or 8 miles south of Iowa, moving west at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Charles, Sulphur, Westlake, Iowa, Grand Lake, Lake Charles Regional Airport, Carlyss, Hacketts Corner, Heberts Marina, Hackberry, Sweet Lake, Holmwood and Bell City. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 17 and 42. Interstate 210 between mile markers 1 and 12. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Calcasieu; East Cameron; Jefferson Davis; West Cameron
